metadata.titleEn: Aerosol optical property dataset of the Tibetan Plateau by ground-based observation (2009-2016)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原气溶胶光学特性地基观测数据集（2009-2016）
metadata.description: The measurement data of the sun spectrophotometer can be directly used to perform inversion on the optical thickness of the non-water vapor channel, Rayleigh scattering, aerosol optical thickness, and moisture content of the atmospheric air column (using the measurement data at 936 nm of the water vapor channel). The aerosol optical property data set of the Tibetan Plateau by ground-based observations was obtained by adopting the Cimel 318 sun photometer, and both the Mt. Qomolangma and Namco stations were involved. The temporal coverage of the data is from 2009 to 2016, and the temporal resolution is one day. The sun photometer has eight observation channels from visible light to near infrared. The center wavelengths are 340, 380, 440, 500, 670, 870, 940 and 1120 nm. The field angle of the instrument is 1.2°, and the sun tracking accuracy is 0.1°. According to the direct solar radiation, the aerosol optical thickness of 6 bands can be obtained, and the estimated accuracy is 0.01 to 0.02. Finally, the AERONET unified inversion algorithm was used to obtain aerosol optical thickness, Angstrom index, particle size spectrum, single scattering albedo, phase function, birefringence index, asymmetry factor, etc.
metadata.descriptionCn: 太阳分光光度计的测量数据可以直接用来反演非水汽通道的光学厚度、瑞利散射、气溶胶光学厚度、大气气柱的水汽含量（使用水汽通道936nm处的测量数据）。青藏高原气溶胶光学特性地基观测数据集采用Cimel 318太阳光度计连续观测获得，涉及珠峰站和纳木错站共两个站点。数据覆盖时间从2009年到2016年，时间分辨率为逐日。太阳光度计在可见光至近红外设有8个观测通道，中心波长分别为：340、380、440、500、670、870、940和1120 nm。仪器的视场角为1.2°，太阳跟踪精度为0.1°。根据太阳直接辐射可获得6个波段的气溶胶光学厚度，精度估计为0.01-0.02。最终采用AERONET统一反演算法，获得气溶胶光学厚度、Angstrom指数、粒度谱、单次散射反照率、相函数、复折射指数和不对称因子等。
metadata.instructions: File name: the data is stored in Excel format, and the file name is named after the time + place, such as "090101_ Nam_CO", which represents the aerosol optical characteristics in Namuco area from January 1, 2009 to December 31, 2016

background: The Tibetan Plateau (TP) is one of the most imposing topographic features on the surface of the Earth. With an immense area (about 2,500,000 km2) and mean elevation of more than 4000 m above sea level, TP plays a key role in Asia climatology and atmospheric circulation. Meanwhile, the atmosphere over the plateau is probably the least affected by human activities in the Asian continent due to the sparse population and minimal industries, providing a unique opportunity to describe atmospheric processes and changes. In this context, several model simulation and satellite observation works have been carried out over the TP to elucidate the effects of aerosol on regional climate and water cycles. Considering its huge area and essential role in the climate system, the lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over TP leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments. AERONET (Aerosol Robotic Network) is a worldwide aerosol characterization network with the automatic CIMEL Sun/sky radiometer as the principal instrument. Due to its significant advances on observation techniques and analysis methods, AERONET has been producing reliably and continuously detailed optical properties of various types of aerosols worldwide.
research objective: This paper will focus on the optical properties (AOD, Angstrom parameter) and volume size distribution of aerosols in this poorly understood region based on the first-year (Aug 2006–Jul 2007) AERONET data. We expect such information can help to understand the atmosphere condition and interactive processes over the TP, validate the product of satellite measurements, and improve the initialization for climate models involving TP and the surrounding regions.
challenges: Considering its huge area and essential role in the climate system, the lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over TP leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments.
methods: Measurements of aerosol optical properties were made with AERONET sun/sky radiometers at the Nam Co Station, a remote high elevation site in central TP from August 2006 to July 2007. In order to determine the occurrence and percentage of different aerosol types, twelve TSP samples (monthly) were also analyzed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM, PHILIPS XL 30 FEG) equipped with an energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis (EDX).
dataset: Very low aerosol optical values were observed with annual mean Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD) of 0.05 at 500 nm during August 2006 to July 2007. Angstrom parameters were also low with an average of 0.42±0.27. In August 2006, an automatic sun and sky scanning radiometer (CIMEL) was established at Nam Co, central Tibetan Plateau as an AERONET site.
findings: It was also found the AOD produced by AREONET measurement in this study (annual mean value 0.05) is significantly lower than simultaneous MODIS observation. The WVC has a clear seasonal pattern with maximum values in summer and minimum values during autumn and winter, which is consistent with the meteorological record by AWS and reflects the reliability of the WVC retrieval method. The volume size distribution of aerosols is bimodal except for spring. This work could enhance our knowledge on the aerosol distribution over the TP and helpful for the modeling of climate change and validation of satellite remote sensing products.
backgroundCn: 青藏高原（TP）是地球表面最引人注目的地形特征之一。其面积约为250万平方公里，平均海拔超过4000米，青藏高原在亚洲气候学和大气环流中发挥着关键作用。同时，由于人口稀少和工业活动极少，青藏高原上空的大气可能是亚洲大陆上受人类活动影响最小的，这为描述大气过程和变化提供了独特的机会。在这种背景下，针对青藏高原的多项模型模拟和卫星观测工作已开展，以阐明气溶胶对区域气候和水循环的影响。考虑到其广阔的面积和在气候系统中的重要作用，青藏高原上气溶胶光学特性的详细知识缺乏，导致气候建模和评估中存在较大不确定性。AERONET（气溶胶机器人网络）是一个全球气溶胶特征化网络，以自动CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计作为主要仪器。由于其在观测技术和分析方法上的显著进展，AERONET持续可靠地提供全球各种类型气溶胶的详细光学特性。
research objectiveCn: 本文将重点研究这一尚不充分了解地区的气溶胶光学特性（AOD、Angstrom参数）和体积粒径分布，基于第一年的（2006年8月–2007年7月）AERONET数据。我们期望这些信息能够帮助理解青藏 Plateau（TP）上的大气条件和相互作用过程，验证卫星测量产品，并改善涉及TP及周边地区的气候模型的初始化。
challengesCn: 考虑到其广阔的面积和在气候系统中的重要作用，缺乏对青藏 Plateau（TP）气溶胶光学特性的详细了解，导致气候模型和评估中存在较大的不确定性。
methodsCn: 在2006年8月至2007年7月期间，在中央青藏 Plateau的纳木措站进行了气溶胶光学特性的测量，使用了AERONET太阳/天空辐射计。为了确定不同气溶胶类型的出现频率和百分比，还对12个总悬浮颗粒（TSP）样本（每月一个）进行了扫描电子显微镜（SEM，PHILIPS XL 30 FEG）分析，并配备了能量色散X射线微分析（EDX）。
datasetCn: 在2006年8月至2007年7月期间，观察到非常低的气溶胶光学值，500纳米处的年均气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）为0.05。Angstrom参数也很低，平均值为0.42±0.27。2006年8月，在中央藏区的纳木措建立了一个自动太阳和天空扫描辐射计（CIMEL），作为AERONET站点。
findingsCn: 本研究中发现，AREONET测量的AOD（年均值0.05）显著低于同时期的MODIS观测。水汽含量（WVC）具有明显的季节性模式，夏季值最大，秋冬季值最小，这与自动气象站（AWS）的气象记录一致，反映了WVC检索方法的可靠性。除了春季外，气溶胶的体积粒径分布呈双峰分布。这项工作可以增强我们对青藏高原（TP）气溶胶分布的认识，并有助于气候变化建模和卫星遥感产品的验证。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the primary data collection techniques used for observing aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 观察青藏 Plateau 上气溶胶光学特性的主要数据收集技术有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: The primary data collection technique involves the use of Cimel 318 sun photometers, which measure direct solar radiation across eight spectral channels to derive aerosol optical thickness and other properties. Observations are made daily, and the AERONET unified inversion algorithm is used to analyze the data.
Definition.AnswerCn: 主要的数据收集技术涉及使用Cimel 318太阳光度计，该设备通过八个光谱通道测量直接太阳辐射，以推导气溶胶光学厚度和其他特性。观察每天进行，并使用AERONET统一反演算法分析数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with collecting aerosol optical data in remote regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在像西藏高原这样的偏远地区收集气溶胶光学数据面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges include the vast area and high elevation of the Tibetan Plateau, which can introduce uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments due to limited knowledge of aerosol optical properties. The region's sparse population and minimal industrial activities also mean fewer opportunities for data collection compared to more populated areas.
Definition.AnswerCn: 挑战包括青藏高原的广阔面积和高海拔，这可能由于对气溶胶光学特性的知识有限而在气候建模和评估中引入不确定性。该地区人口稀少，工业活动较少，这也意味着与人口较多地区相比，数据收集的机会较少。

Definition.QuestionEn: What potential datasets could be used to study the optical properties of aerosols in high-altitude regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 可以用来研究高海拔地区气溶胶光学特性的潜在数据集有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: Potential datasets include those collected by AERONET using automatic sun/sky radiometers, which provide detailed optical properties of aerosols. These datasets are valuable for understanding atmospheric conditions, validating satellite measurements, and improving climate model initialization.
Definition.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集包括由AERONET使用自动太阳/天空辐射计收集的数据，这些数据提供了气溶胶的详细光学特性。这些数据集对于理解大气条件、验证卫星测量以及改善气候模型初始化非常有价值。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using the CIMEL sun/sky radiometer compare to those utilizing scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis (EDX) in capturing aerosol optical properties?
Comparison.QuestionCn: CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计的数据收集方法与使用扫描电子显微镜（SEM）和能量色散X射线微分析（EDX）的方法在捕捉气溶胶光学特性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The CIMEL sun/sky radiometer continuously observes aerosol optical properties such as optical depth and Angstrom parameter, providing detailed optical properties through AERONET's unified inversion algorithm. In contrast, SEM and EDX analyze TSP samples to determine aerosol types on a monthly basis, offering insights into the occurrence and percentage of different aerosol types.
Comparison.AnswerCn: CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计持续观察气溶胶光学特性，如光学深度和Angstrom参数，通过AERONET的统一反演算法提供详细的光学特性。相比之下，SEM和EDX每月分析TSP样本，以确定气溶胶类型，提供不同气溶胶类型的出现频率和百分比的见解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the challenges in detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau imply uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在西藏高原上对气溶胶光学特性详细了解的挑战可能意味着气候建模和评估中的不确定性是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments, as this region plays a key role in Asia's climatology and atmospheric circulation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 对青藏 Plateau 上气溶胶光学特性的缺乏详细了解导致气候建模和评估中存在较大不确定性，因为该地区在亚洲气候学和大气环流中发挥着关键作用。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What interpretation can be made about the reliability of aerosol optical depth measurements when comparing AERONET and satellite observations in the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在比较青藏高原的AERONET和卫星观测时，可以对气溶胶光学深度测量的可靠性做出什么解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The AERONET measurement of aerosol optical depth showed significantly lower values than simultaneous MODIS satellite observations, indicating potential discrepancies between ground-based and satellite data, which could affect the validation and interpretation of remote sensing products.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: AERONET对气溶胶光学深度的测量显示出明显低于同时期MODIS卫星观测的值，这表明地面数据与卫星数据之间可能存在差异，这可能会影响遥感产品的验证和解释。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the limited detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau, and how does this affect climate modeling and assessments?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致对青藏 Plateau气溶胶光学特性知识有限的因素有哪些？这对气候建模和评估有何影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The limited detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau is primarily due to its vast area and essential role in the climate system, leading to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 对青藏 Plateau 的气溶胶光学特性的有限详细了解，主要是由于其广阔的面积和在气候系统中的重要作用，这导致气候模型和评估中存在较大的不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the differences in aerosol optical depth values observed from ground-based measurements and satellite observations over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致在青藏高原上从地面测量和卫星观测中观察到的气溶胶光学深度值差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The differences in aerosol optical depth values observed from ground-based measurements and satellite observations over the Tibetan Plateau may be caused by the unique atmospheric conditions of the region and the limitations in satellite retrieval methods, as seen in the significantly lower AOD values from AERONET compared to MODIS observations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在西藏高原上，从地面测量和卫星观测得到的气溶胶光学深度（AOD）值之间的差异可能是由于该地区独特的气候条件以及卫星反演方法的局限性所导致的，正如AERONET观测到的AOD值明显低于MODIS观测值所示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the Tibetan Plateau considered a unique region for studying atmospheric processes and changes, and what are the implications for data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么青藏高原被认为是研究大气过程和变化的独特区域，以及这对数据收集方法的影响是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau is considered a unique region for studying atmospheric processes and changes due to its sparse population and minimal industrial activity, which minimizes human impact, providing a unique opportunity to describe natural atmospheric processes and changes. This uniqueness necessitates specialized data collection methods that can capture the undisturbed atmospheric conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 青藏高原被认为是研究大气过程和变化的独特区域，因为其人口稀少且工业活动最小，减少了人类影响，为描述自然大气过程和变化提供了独特的机会。这种独特性需要专门的数据收集方法，以捕捉未受干扰的大气条件。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using Cimel 318 sun photometers for continuous data collection on the accuracy and reliability of aerosol optical property datasets in remote regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用Cimel 318太阳光度计在像西藏高原这样的偏远地区进行连续数据收集，可能对气溶胶光学特性数据集的准确性和可靠性产生哪些潜在后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using Cimel 318 sun photometers allows for high-precision measurement of aerosol optical properties with a sun tracking precision of 0.1° and an estimated accuracy of 0.01-0.02 for aerosol optical thickness. This leads to highly reliable datasets that can reduce uncertainties in climate models, especially in remote regions such as the Tibetan Plateau, where human activities minimally impact the atmosphere.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用Cimel 318太阳光度计可以高精度测量气溶胶光学特性，具有0.1°的太阳追踪精度和0.01-0.02的气溶胶光学厚度估计精度。这导致了高度可靠的数据集，可以减少气候模型中的不确定性，特别是在像西藏高原这样的偏远地区，人类活动对大气的影响较小。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties affect climate modeling and assessments in regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 气溶胶光学特性缺乏详细知识可能会如何影响像青藏高原这样的地区的气候建模和评估？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments. This is due to the essential role that aerosols play in the climate system, affecting regional climate and water cycles. More precise data collection and analysis, like those provided by AERONET, are crucial for improving these models.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 对青藏 Plateau 上气溶胶光学特性的缺乏详细了解导致气候建模和评估中存在较大不确定性。这是因为气溶胶在气候系统中发挥着重要作用，影响区域气候和水循环。更精确的数据收集和分析，如 AERONET 提供的数据，对于改善这些模型至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of using Cimel 318 sun photometers for collecting aerosol optical properties on the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用Cimel 318太阳光度计在青藏高原收集气溶胶光学特性的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to capture continuous and reliable data on aerosol optical properties such as aerosol optical depth (AOD), Angstrom index, and other related parameters, which help in understanding atmospheric processes and changes over the Tibetan Plateau. This information is crucial for improving climate models and validating satellite observations in this region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是持续可靠地捕获气溶胶光学特性的数据，如气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）、安格斯特指数及其他相关参数，这有助于理解青藏高原的气候过程和变化。这些信息对于改善气候模型和验证该地区的卫星观测至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to analyze aerosol types using a combination of AERONET data and scanning electron microscopy in the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原上，使用AERONET数据和扫描电子显微镜结合分析气溶胶类型的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Analyzing aerosol types using both AERONET data and scanning electron microscopy allows for a comprehensive understanding of aerosol characteristics and their distribution in the Tibetan Plateau. This approach helps in identifying different aerosol types and enhances the reliability of data used for climate modeling and assessment.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用AERONET数据和扫描电子显微镜分析气溶胶类型，可以全面了解青藏高原的气溶胶特征及其分布。这种方法有助于识别不同的气溶胶类型，并增强用于气候建模和评估的数据的可靠性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of investigating aerosol volume size distribution and optical properties using AERONET on the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 调查青藏高原气溶胶体积粒径分布和光学特性的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goals include understanding the atmospheric conditions and interactive processes over the Tibetan Plateau, validating satellite measurement products, and improving the initialization for climate models. This data provides insights into aerosol distribution patterns, which are essential for addressing uncertainties in climate modeling over this significant geographic area.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标包括理解青藏 Plateau 上的气象条件和互动过程，验证卫星测量产品，并改善气候模型的初始化。这些数据提供了气溶胶分布模式的洞察，这对于解决该重要地理区域气候建模中的不确定性至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in utilizing a sun/sky radiometer to obtain aerosol optical properties at high-altitude sites?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 利用太阳/天空辐射计在高海拔地点获取气溶胶光学特性的程序包括哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Measurements of aerosol optical properties are made with AERONET sun/sky radiometers. This involves establishing an automatic sun and sky scanning radiometer, such as the CIMEL, at a site like Nam Co in the central Tibetan Plateau. The radiometer captures data that are processed using the AERONET unified inversion algorithm to obtain parameters such as aerosol optical thickness, Angstrom index, and volume size distribution.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 气溶胶光学特性的测量是通过AERONET太阳/天空辐射计进行的。这涉及在像中央藏区的纳木措这样的地点建立自动太阳和天空扫描辐射计，例如CIMEL。辐射计捕获的数据通过AERONET统一反演算法进行处理，以获得气溶胶光学厚度、安格斯特指数和体积粒径分布等参数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are aerosol samples collected and analyzed to determine their types and properties in remote locations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何在偏远地区收集和分析气溶胶样本，以确定它们的类型和性质？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Aerosol samples are collected monthly, with twelve TSP (Total Suspended Particles) samples analyzed using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) equipped with energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis (EDX). This method allows for the determination of the occurrence and percentage of different aerosol types at remote high elevation sites like the Nam Co Station in the Tibetan Plateau.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 气溶胶样本每月收集一次，使用配备能量色散X射线微分析（EDX）的扫描电子显微镜（SEM）分析十二个TSP（总悬浮颗粒）样本。这种方法可以确定在像藏北高原的纳木措站等偏远高海拔地点不同气溶胶类型的出现情况和百分比。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the accurate measurement of aerosol optical properties in remote high-elevation sites like the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在像西藏高原这样的偏远高海拔地区准确测量气溶胶光学特性成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of AERONET sun/sky radiometers, such as the CIMEL Sun/sky radiometer, enables reliable and continuous measurement of detailed aerosol optical properties, even in remote high-elevation sites like the Tibetan Plateau.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用AERONET太阳/天空辐射计，如CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计，可以在偏远的高海拔地区（如青藏高原）可靠地和连续地测量详细的气溶胶光学特性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do specific data collection methods enable the differentiation of aerosol types in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 特定的数据收集方法如何使得在青藏高原地区区分气溶胶类型成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The combination of AERONET measurements with scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis (EDX) enables the determination of different aerosol types by analyzing collected total suspended particle (TSP) samples.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 将AERONET测量与扫描电子显微镜（SEM）和能量色散X射线微分析（EDX）相结合，可以通过分析收集的总悬浮颗粒（TSP）样本来确定不同的气溶胶类型。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways does the use of continuous ground-based observation datasets enable improved climate modeling and satellite measurement validation over the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 连续的地面观测数据集的使用如何促进了对青藏高原的气候建模和卫星测量验证的改进？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Continuous ground-based observations, such as those obtained using Cimel 318 sun photometers, provide detailed aerosol optical properties, which help to validate satellite measurements and improve the initialization of climate models involving the Tibetan Plateau and surrounding regions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 持续的地面观测，例如使用Cimel 318太阳光度计获得的观测，提供了详细的气溶胶光学特性，这有助于验证卫星测量并改善涉及青藏高原及周边地区的气候模型的初始化。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in accurately modeling the climate system over the Tibetan Plateau without detailed aerosol optical properties?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在没有详细气溶胶光学特性的情况下，准确建模青藏高原的气候系统可能会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over the Tibetan Plateau leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments, as the plateau plays a key role in regional climate systems and atmospheric circulation.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对青藏高原气溶胶光学特性的缺乏详细了解导致气候模型和评估中存在较大不确定性，因为该高原在区域气候系统和大气环流中发挥着关键作用。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of using CIMEL sun/sky radiometers for capturing aerosol optical properties on the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您对在青藏高原使用CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计捕捉气溶胶光学特性的有效性有何评估？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of CIMEL sun/sky radiometers is considered effective for capturing detailed optical properties of aerosols on the Tibetan Plateau due to its ability to provide reliably and continuously detailed data, as evidenced by its successful deployment at the Nam Co Station. Additionally, the AERONET network's standardized algorithms enhance the accuracy of the data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: CIMEL太阳/天空辐射计被认为在捕捉青藏高原气溶胶的光学特性方面非常有效，因为它能够提供可靠且持续的详细数据，这在纳木错站的成功部署中得到了证明。此外，AERONET网络的标准化算法提高了数据的准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how might the integration of scanning electron microscopy with energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis enhance the understanding of aerosol types in this region?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，扫描电子显微镜与能量色散X射线微分析的结合如何增强对该地区气溶胶类型的理解？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating scanning electron microscopy with energy-dispersive X-ray microanalysis can enhance the understanding of aerosol types by providing detailed compositional analysis, which complements optical measurements and helps in identifying the occurrence and percentages of different aerosol types, thereby refining climate models and satellite product validation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 将扫描电子显微镜与能量色散X射线微分析相结合，可以通过提供详细的成分分析来增强对气溶胶类型的理解，这补充了光学测量，并有助于识别不同气溶胶类型的出现和百分比，从而完善气候模型和卫星产品验证。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand the difficulties involved in accurately modeling climate impacts over vast regions such as the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不理解在像青藏高原这样广阔地区准确建模气候影响所涉及的困难。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Considering its huge area and essential role in the climate system, the lack of detailed knowledge of aerosol optical properties over TP leads to large uncertainties in climate modeling and assessments.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 考虑到其广阔的面积和在气候系统中的重要作用，缺乏对青藏 Plateau（TP）气溶胶光学特性的详细了解导致气候模型和评估中存在较大的不确定性。
